trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects.

A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> object can represent an element in the project, or a virtual collection of items, containing the items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> 개체는 프로젝트에 있는 요소를 나타낼 수 있습니다 또는 항목이 포함 된 항목의 가상 컬렉션에서 와일드 카드를 확인 한 후 만든는 `Include` 및 `Exclude` 의 특성은 `Item` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> 개체와 사용 하 여는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> 메서드를 프로젝트에 콘텐츠를 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, 및 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> 클래스는 추가, 제거 및 프로젝트에 항목을 변경 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> class.
Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> 개체와 사용 하 여는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> 메서드를 프로젝트에 콘텐츠를 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, 및 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> 클래스는 추가, 제거 및 프로젝트에 항목을 변경 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property values to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> 및 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> 속성 값을 갖는 새 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" />을 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> 개체와 사용 하 여는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> 메서드를 프로젝트에 콘텐츠를 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, 및 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> 클래스는 추가, 제거 및 프로젝트에 항목을 변경 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property value to assign the new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.
<see langword="true" /> to treat the <c>itemInclude</c> parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>itemInclude</c> 매개 변수를 리터럴 값으로 처리하려면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그러지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property values to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />, allowing you to specify whether the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> property value is treated as a literal.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> 및 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name" /> 속성 값을 갖는 새 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" />을 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />에 추가합니다. 또한 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include" /> 속성 값을 리터럴로 처리할지 여부를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" />.

Removes the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup.Condition" /> property value and all <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
<see langword="true" /> to create a deep copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />의 전체 복사본을 만들려면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
A copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> references the same property group as the original.
trans-unit.target: 단순 복사본을는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> 원본과 동일한 속성 그룹을 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
trans-unit.target: 수정 내용을 단순 복사본 두 복사본에 반영 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> can be independently modified.
trans-unit.target: 전체 복사본을 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> 의 복사본을 둘 다 있도록 참조를 새 XML 요소를 만듭니다는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> 독립적으로 수정할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element), only deep copies are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> 프로젝트의 요소에 직접 해당 (에서 와일드 카드를 확인 한 후 만든 항목의 컬렉션에 해당 하는 대신는 `Include` 및 `Exclude` 의 특성은 `Item` 요소), 전체 복사본을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the item group.
trans-unit.target: 항목 그룹의 <c>Condition</c> 특성 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the item group.
Gets a value indicating the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
An integer value representing the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 호출자가 사용할 수는 `foreach` C# 언어의 (`for each` Visual basic에서)는 개인을 반복 하 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> 개체에 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty><xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> classes to list all the items and properties in the project.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> 개체와 사용 하 여는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, 및 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> 클래스 모든 항목 및는 프로젝트의 속성을 나열 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item group was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: 항목 그룹을 프로젝트로 가져왔는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item group was imported into the project; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 항목 그룹을 프로젝트로 가져왔으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object to get or set.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> to remove.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> 개체와 사용 하 여는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> 메서드를 프로젝트에 콘텐츠를 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, 및 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> 클래스는 추가, 제거 및 프로젝트에 항목을 변경 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> object to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> at the specified index from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
Copies the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> to a new array.
A new array containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem" /> objects copied from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" />.
